comment: Where are the directions for mash temp and the stats to try to replicate?

Mash at 153.
Make sure you bag the CTC when you add it to the boil, take it out when you stop the boil.
I've used Wyeast 1335, British Ale II, with good success. 
Boil the cinnamon sticks in about a cup of water, cool, and add all the liquid and sticks ~48 hours before packaging. Leave it on the sticks longer if you want more flavor.
